creator: nadirkhalid@hotmail.com
text:
Files starting with dot character are not recognized by fileset or mapper tasks.
Example:
<delete>
  <fileset dir="." includes="**/.cvsignore" />
</delete>

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
.cvsignore is part of the default excludes, throw in a defaultexcludes="no" as an
attribute for your fileset and it should work.

creator: nadirkhalid@hotmail.com
